contents.content: 第三部分 三种句子类型
第一章 简单句
第二节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析10例
Example 1
真题回放：In 1998, some of these countries already exported more than twice their 1990 volumes and imported more than five times their 1990 volumes. （剑10阅读）

contents.title: 我们的目的就是给广大公众提供受教育的机会，并且为农业专家和其他科学家提供研究场所。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。In 1998是介词短语作时间状语，some of these countries是主语，exported和imported是由and连接的两个并列谓语，more than twice their 1990 volumes和more than five times their 1990 volumes分别是exported和imported的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：It is difficult to conceive of vigorous economic growth without an efficient transport system. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。It是形式主语，is是系动词，difficult是表语，不定式短语to conceive of vigorous economic growth without an efficient transport system是真正的主语。
Example 3
真题回放：At the time of Perkin's enrolment, the Royal College of Chemistry was headed by the noted German chemist August Wilhelm Hofmann. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。the Royal College of Chemistry是主语，was headed是谓语。At the time of Perkin's enrolment是介词短语作时间状语，by the noted German chemist August Wilhelm Hofmann是介词短语作方式状语。
Example 4
真题回放：All the main languages have been studied prescriptively, especially in the 18th century approach to the writing of grammars and dictionaries. （剑9阅读）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。All the main languages是主语，have been studied是谓语。prescriptively是副词，修饰studied；especially是副词，修饰介词短语in the 18th century approach，该介词短语作状语；to the writing of grammars and dictionaries是介词短语作后置定语，修饰approach。
Example 5
真题回放：So far there have been a number of searches by various groups around the world, including Australian searches using the radio telescope at Parkes, New South Wales. （剑9阅读）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。该句是there be句型的倒装句，主语是a number of searches, have been是系动词，there是副词作表语。So far是时间状语，by various groups around the world是介词短语作后置定语，修饰searches；including Australian searches是介词短语作伴随状语，using the radio telescope是现在分词短语作后置定语，修饰searches；at Parkes, New South Wales是介词短语作地点状语。
Example 6
真题回放：The literature to date on noise in school rooms appears to focus on the effects on schoolchildren in general, their teachers and the hearing impaired. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。The literature是主语，to date on noise in school rooms是介词短语作后置定语，修饰The literature；
appears是系动词，to focus on the effects是不定式短语作表语。on schoolchildren in general, their teachers and the hearing impaired是介词短语作后置定语，修饰effects。
Example 7
真题回放：During his vacation in 1856, Perkin spent his time in the laboratory on the top floor of his family's house. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Perkin是主语，spent是谓语，his time是宾语。During his vacation in 1856是介词短语作时间状语，in the laboratory是介词短语作地点状语；on the top floor of his family's house是介词短语作后置定语，修饰laboratory。
Example 8

真题回放：Whales (including the small whales we call dolphins) and dugongs, with their close cousins the manatees, ceased to be land creatures altogether and reverted to the full marine habits of their remote ancestors. （剑9阅读）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Whales和dugongs是并列的主语，ceased和reverted to是并列的谓语；to be land creatures是不定式短语作ceased的宾语，the full marine habits of their remote ancestors是名词短语作reverted to的宾语；altogether是副词，修饰谓语ceased；with their close cousins the manatees是介词短语作伴随状语。
Example 9

真题回放：Finally, they offer those condemned to spend five days a week in an urban environment an unrivalled area of freedom to unwind and take part in a range of leisure activities, such as hunting, riding and hiking. （剑7阅读）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾”。they是主语，offer是谓语；those是间接宾语，condemned to spend five days a week in an urban environment是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰those；an unrivalled area of freedom是直接宾语。to unwind and take part in a range of leisure activities是不定式短语，作宾语those的补足语；such as表示列举。
Example 10
真题回放：This causes the outer layer of the pane to contract and solidify before the interior. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾补”。This是主语，causes是谓语，the outer layer是宾语；of the pane是介词短语作后置定语，修饰the outer layer；to contract and solidify before the interior是不定式短语作宾语补足语。
二、雅思听力真题分析10例
Example 1
真题回放：Today we continue our series on ecology and conservation with a look at a particularly endangered member of the black bear family. （剑10听力）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。we是主语，continue是谓语，our series是宾语，on ecology and conservation是介词短语作后置定语，修饰our series。with a look at a particularly endangered member是介词短语作方式状语，of the black bear family是介词短语作后置定语，修饰member。
Example 2
真题回放：The best way to protect them is to make every effort to preserve the delicate balance of their forest environment—in other words, their ecosystem. （剑10听力）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。The best way是主语，to protect them是不定式短语作后置定语，修饰The best way, is是系动词，to make every effort是不定式短语作表语。to preserve the delicate balance是不定式短语作目的状语，of their forest environment是介词短语作后置定语，修饰balance, in other words是插入语，their ecosystem是their forest environment的同位语。
Example 3
真题回放：The company grew rapidly and has been providing holidays in continental Europe for the last fifteen years. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。The company是主语，grew和has been providing是并列的谓语，holidays是第二个谓语的宾语。in continental Europe是介词短语作地点状语，for the last fifteen years是介词短语作时间状语。
Example 4
真题回放：The whole place has been given a new minimalist look with the company's signature colours of black and red. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。The whole place是主语，has been given是谓语，a new minimalist look是宾语；with the company's signature colours of black and red是介词短语作后置定语，修饰look。
Example 5
真题回放：After about five hours on the surface the float automatically sinks, beginning the whole process again. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。the float是主语，sinks是谓语。After about five hours是介词短语作时间状语，on the surface是介词短语作地点状语，beginning the whole process again是现在分词短语作伴随状语。
Example 6
真题回放：In order to address the traffic problems, the pavements on the corner of Carberry and Thomas Street will be widened. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。the pavements是主语，will be widened是谓语。In order to address the traffic problems是介词短语作目的状语，on the corner of Carberry and Thomas Street是介词短语作后置定语，修饰the pavements。
Example 7
真题回放：The main attraction is the large swimming pool with salt water. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本句型是：“主+系+表”。The main attraction是主语，is是系动词，the large swimming pool是表语，with salt water是介词短语作后置定语，修饰swimming pool。
Example 8
真题回放：All entrants will receive a special sports calendar with details of all Bradcaster fixtures in the coming year. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。All entrants是主语，will receive是谓语；a special sports calendar是宾语，with details of all Bradcaster fixtures in the coming year是介词短语作后置定语，修饰sports calendar。
Example 9
真题回放：We do allow students to take photographs. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾补”。We是主语，do allow是谓语，students是宾语，to take photographs是不定式短语作宾语补足语。
Example 10
真题回放：Our remit is to give educational opportunities to the wider public as well as to offer research sites for a wide variety of agriculturists and other scientists. （剑8听力）

语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。Our remit是主语，is是系动词，to give educational opportunities和to offer research sites是并列的不定式短语作表语。educational opportunities和the wider public又分别是动词give的直接宾语和间接宾语，research sites 和a wide variety of agriculturists and other scientists又分别是动词offer的直接宾语和间接宾语。
